verse: When the Lord finishes doing what he planned to Mount Zion and Jerusalem, he will punish the king of Assyria for ·his proud heart and evil deeds [the fruit of his great/exalted heart and glory of his haughty/high eyes].
The king of Assyria says this:
This is what the Lord God ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] says:
